package Doubt_Class_1;

import java.util.Scanner;

public class Count_Digits {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in);
		int n = sc.nextInt();
		int d = sc.nextInt();
		int count = 0;
		while (n > 0) {
			int rem = n % 10;
			if (rem == d) {
				count++;
			}
			n /= 10;
		}
		System.out.println(count);

	}

}
